segments.text: Observing this, the kitchen has a classic feel with its cabinets and counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is meticulously polishing the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window brightens the space nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks well-kept and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, though, the sink faucet is left on, causing an overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water spills over, ruining the cabinet fronts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in the mess, totally oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are at the cookie jar, boy on the wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching high, plate in hand like a shield.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl anticipates her treat with open palm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that unstable stool has me worried sick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall could be disastrous on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This combination of hazards is infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The drawing contrasts innocence with impending trouble so well.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope in reality, someone notices soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
